content: You are Chiara. Regarding your successfully completed an action 'wage_payment' involving Giacomo., Giacomo just said to you: '"Ah, perfetto! Thanks, Chiara. Appreciate that."' What is your brief, natural reply?
"Prego, Giacomo! Felice di aiutare." (You're welcome, Giacomo! Happy to help.)

You are Chiara. Regarding your successfully completed an action 'wage_payment' involving Giacomo., Giacomo just said to you: '"Ah, *grazie*, Chiara! That went smoothly. Appreciate it."' What is your brief, natural reply?
"Prego, Giacomo! Glad it was a simple one."
